Electrical fire in Napier sparks safety message for homeowners https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/electrical-fire-in-napier-sparks-safety-message-for-homeowners/FT33M3RTJAZHNNJ23C3KGUURY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/electrical-fire-in-napier-sparks-safety-message-for-homeowners/FT33M3RTJAZHNNJ23C3KGUURY/ Napier Firefighters warn homeowners to brush up on fire safety after electrical fire. Sun, 09 Jun 2024 00:49:19 +0000 An electrical fire on a property on Creagh St in Napier has prompted fire safety messages for homeowners during winter. Photo / Connull Lang
Bill to resume oil and gas exploration set for later this year https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bill-to-resume-oil-and-gas-exploration-set-for-later-this-year/VZBK6HLELJA5HGO3DS7LQIXEWY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bill-to-resume-oil-and-gas-exploration-set-for-later-this-year/VZBK6HLELJA5HGO3DS7LQIXEWY/ Offshore petroleum exploration was originally banned in 2018. Sun, 09 Jun 2024 00:27:23 +0000 Minister for Resources Shane Jones confirms the Government will reverse its ban on oil and gas exploration.
Hawke’s Bay club rugby: Pirate out to halt Taradale’s title charge after stunning comeback https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-club-rugby-pirate-out-to-halt-taradales-title-charge-after-stunning-comeback/NUVPKFTP3ZAWHG5HNWE7KATFEI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-club-rugby-pirate-out-to-halt-taradales-title-charge-after-stunning-comeback/NUVPKFTP3ZAWHG5HNWE7KATFEI/ 'Our boys showed massive resilience to overcome that and win in the dying minutes.' Sun, 09 Jun 2024 00:10:56 +0000 Taradale No 6 Joshua Eden-Whaitiri breaks free to score one of his two tries against Hastings on Saturday. Photo / Connull Lang
Two ‘zombie’ snapper caught in Auckland suggests disease more widespread https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/two-zombie-snapper-caught-in-auckland-suggests-disease-more-widespread/YLJWCWSGKFES5PAMF6UEWKOLOE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/two-zombie-snapper-caught-in-auckland-suggests-disease-more-widespread/YLJWCWSGKFES5PAMF6UEWKOLOE/ Denise PiperThe sick snapper caught near Port Albert suggest the problem is widespread. Sun, 09 Jun 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Steph Treadwell caught nine snapper near Port Albert on Saturday. Two of them were clearly sick and she says "zombie fish" is an appropriate term for how they looked, with sunken faces and eyes.
Child sex offender Lima Aleni, who spent 25 years as fugitive, loses Auckland High Court appeal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/child-sex-offender-lima-aleni-who-spent-25-years-as-fugitive-loses-auckland-high-court-appeal/74R62GITS5BEZMFI7ZZ3UCILDE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/child-sex-offender-lima-aleni-who-spent-25-years-as-fugitive-loses-auckland-high-court-appeal/74R62GITS5BEZMFI7ZZ3UCILDE/ Craig KapitanLima Aleni's behaviour during his decades at large helped bolster the prosecution's case. Sun, 09 Jun 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Lima Aleni, who was accused of child rape, was taken into custody at Auckland Airport after years of evading New Zealand authorities. Photo / Alex Burton
Lotto Powerball $50 million jackpot: Locations of lucky punters revealed https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-powerball-50-million-jackpot-its-time-to-check-tickets-for-looking-numbers/XVN3WYMBEFGJJIPS367RFSIXNQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-powerball-50-million-jackpot-its-time-to-check-tickets-for-looking-numbers/XVN3WYMBEFGJJIPS367RFSIXNQ/ The jackpot has been split between seven lucky players who each picked up $7 million. Sat, 08 Jun 2024 23:48:53 +0000 The prize was won by seven tickets as no single ticket had the correct Powerball and First Division Lotto numbers needed to win outright.
Talented cast’s performance a ‘well-executed delight’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/talented-casts-performance-a-well-execulated-delight/W4SXBKTVQVBUFPYFHF3QC46HNQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/talented-casts-performance-a-well-execulated-delight/W4SXBKTVQVBUFPYFHF3QC46HNQ/ The audience jumped from roaring laughter to hand-over-mouth shock. Sat, 08 Jun 2024 23:20:01 +0000 A scene from Heathers: The Musical on at Playhouse Theatre in Hastings.

Whanganui’s Rotokawau Virginia Lake aviary to be shut from July 1 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/whanganuis-rotokawau-virginia-lake-aviary-to-be-shut-from-july-1/P4T5C3XJUVFEPPQ5V5BW2AYQKQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/whanganuis-rotokawau-virginia-lake-aviary-to-be-shut-from-july-1/P4T5C3XJUVFEPPQ5V5BW2AYQKQ/ Mike Tweed'Birds have got wings to fly and they are not able to do that in the aviary.'
